mapper.select: select a.language, a.exam, a.level, a.year, a.count, a.source, ifnull(b.rate,'0%') as rate from tb_exam_list a left join (select * from vb_exam_rate where user_id=#{userId}) b on a.source=b.source where a.delete_flag = 0 order by year+0, count+0;
